data.title: Disney accidentally cast a porn star in The Little Mermaid - AsiaOne
data.description: Disney accidentally cast a porn star in The Little Mermaid ... Stefano Tomadini, who has also made adult movies under the alias Dante Ferrari.

# Disney accidentally cast a porn star in The Little Mermaid

![Disney accidentally cast a porn star in The Little Mermaid](https://media.asiaone.com/sites/default/files/styles/article_top_image/public/original_images/Jun2023/130623_little%20mermaid%20actor_instagram.jpg?itok=K6n06fJX)

PHOTO: Instagram/jasonsoul1, Instagram/disneystudios

PUBLISHED ON **June 12, 20238:44 PM**

Disney accidentally cast a porn star in The Little Mermaid.

Casting bosses working on the live-action remake wanted to use "really sexy male models" to portray the mermen in the film, and among those hired for the job was 24-year-old Stefano Tomadini, who has also made adult movies under the alias Dante Ferrari.

His explicit films, for which he was paid up to £1,000 (S$1,680) a time, are still available to watch online, though viewers have to pay.

A source told The Sun newspaper: "Casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie.

"They had no idea about Stefano's racy videos and, given The Little Mermaid is the big summer blockbuster for kids, it's a bit embarrassing for Disney."

While filming the movie in Sardinia, Stefano shared a number of behind-the-scenes photos on Instagram.

Tagging Disney in the post, he wrote in the caption: "Lifetime memories with lifetime friends."

A spokesperson for Disney declined to comment.

The Rob Marshall-helmed remake — which stars Halle Bailey in the title role — was previously dubbed "a classic" by big wigs at the movie studio and seen as an obvious choice for a reimagining.

Tony Chambers, the head of distribution at Disney told Variety: "It's a classic. You ask a lot of women or men of my age and it's The Little Mermaid and Beauty and the Beast that rank as their favourite animated movie.

"It's a story that takes them back to their respective childhoods and this movie is the perfect opportunity for a lot of people to pass that love on to the next generation."

Philip Mehl: Cyclist, Repairman, Teacher \| Ordinary People

[AsiaOne](https://www.dailymotion.com/asiaonecom) Lifestyle & How-to

Philip Mehl’s passion for cycling goes far beyond riding; it’s his way of giving back to the community. With a knack for fixing almost anything, Philip offers free bicycle repairs, ensuring anyone who comes to him can keep moving — whether it’s to work, to school, or simply for the joy of cycling. He is also guiding the next generation by teaching polytechnic students about bike maintenance.

metadata.og:title: Disney accidentally cast a porn star in The Little Mermaid
metadata.twitter:description: Disney accidentally cast a porn star in The Little Mermaid. Casting bosses working on the live-action remake wanted to use "really sexy male models" to portray the mermen in the film, and among those hired for the job was 24-year-old Stefano Tomadini, who has also made adult movies under the alias Dante Ferrari. His explicit films, for which he was...

# Disney accidentally hired adult film star for The Little Mermaid

## Disney hired porn actor

BANG Showbiz - Jun 13, 2023 / 7:04 am \| Story: 431614

![](https://www.castanet.net/content/2023/6/bang_84506_p.jpg)

Photo: BANG Showbiz. All rights reserved.

Disney accidentally cast a porn star in 'The Little Mermaid'.

Casting bosses working on the live-action remake wanted to use "really sexy male models" to portray the mermen in the film, and among those hired for the job was 24-year-old Stefano Tomadini, who has also made adult movies under the alias Dante Ferrari.

His explicit films, for which he was paid up to £1,000 a time, are still available to watch online, though viewers have to pay.

A source told The Sun newspaper: “Casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie.

“They had no idea about Stefano’s racy videos and, given 'The Little Mermaid' is the big summer blockbuster for kids, it’s a bit embarrassing for Disney.”

While filming the movie in Sardinia, Stefano shared a number of behind-the-scenes photos on Instagram.

Tagging Disney in the post, he wrote in the caption: “Lifetime memories with lifetime friends.(sic)"

A spokesperson for Disney declined to comment.

The Rob Marshall-helmed remake - which stars Halle Bailey in the title role - was previously dubbed “a classic” by big wigs at the movie studio and seen as an obvious choice for a reimagining.

Tony Chambers, the head of distribution at Disney told Variety: “It’s a classic. You ask a lot of women or men of my age and it’s ‘Little Mermaid’ and ‘Beauty and the Beast’ that rank as their favorite animated movie. It’s a story that takes them back to their respective childhoods and this movie is the perfect opportunity for a lot of people to pass that love on to the next generation.”

# Disney ‘accidentally’ casts adult film star for a role in The Little Mermaid

- ![](https://pop.inquirer.net/346319/disney-accidentally-casts-adult-film-star-for-a-role-in-the-little-mermaid?s=84&d=mm&r=g)[POP! Jr Contributor – Justine Nicholas Santos](https://pop.inquirer.net/byline/pop-jr-contributor-justine-nicholas-santos)
- [16 June, 2023](https://pop.inquirer.net/346319/disney-accidentally-casts-adult-film-star-for-a-role-in-the-little-mermaid#)
- [No Comments](https://pop.inquirer.net/346319/disney-accidentally-casts-adult-film-star-for-a-role-in-the-little-mermaid#)
- 6.75K

Disney’s latest PG-rated film The Little Mermaid may have “accidentally” included a porn star for a merman role after deciding to hire “really sexy male models” to play the said role in the movie.

One of the hired _mermen_ is 24-year-old Stefano Tomadini, who had also starred in an adult film under the pseudonym Dante Ferrari and has already appeared in three porn videos.

According to a source from The Toronto Sun, the “casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie.”

However, “They had no idea about Stefano’s racy videos and, given ‘The Little Mermaid’ is the big summer blockbuster for kids, it’s a bit embarrassing for Disney,” the source said.

[![Stefano Tomadini](https://pop.inquirer.net/files/2023/06/via-IG.jpg)](https://pop.inquirer.net/files/2023/06/via-IG.jpg) via Instagram

A spokesperson for Disney is [said](https://torontosun.com/entertainment/movies/disney-accidentally-hired-adult-film-star-for-the-little-mermaid) to have declined to comment on the matter.

In light of the news, Tomadini/Ferrari has seemingly disappeared from social media.

The 2023 live-action adaptation of the Disney princess film directed by Rob Marshall (Chicago, Mary Poppin Returns) starring singer and actress Halle Bailey premiered last May, becoming one of the highest-grossing films this year.

The film follows the story of the 1989 animated film of the same name, revolving around young Ariel (played by Bailey) who sacrificed her voice in order to walk and wander the world of humans, and later fall in love with Prince Eric (played by Jonah Hauer-King).

The film also stars Melissa McCarthy as Ursula, Jessica Alexander as Ursula’s human alter-ego Vanessa, Javier Bardem as King Triton, Daveed Diggs as the voice of Sebastian, Jacob Tremblay as the voice of Flounder, and Awkwafina as the voice of Scuttle, among many others.

## 2023 Rewind: Right Wing Aghast that Disney Hired Adult Male Performer as Hunky Extra in 'The Little Mermaid'

### READ TIME: 3 MIN.

_**This piece is part of EDGE's 2023 Rewind series. We're reaching into our archives and sharing some of our favorite stories from the past year.**_

It may be called "The Little Mermaid," but it is one of the film's not-so-little merman who is getting dragged in the culture wars for being an adult male performer who happened to have appeared in the Disney film.

According to [the website Inside the Magic](https://insidethemagic.net/2023/06/disney-cast-a-really-sexy-porn-star-in-the-little-mermaid-remake-cm1/), "when casting the film, an inside source went on record saying, 'Casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie.' Actor [Stefano Tomadini](https://www.instagram.com/p/CYp2HNQMfsT/?hl=en) is a 24-year-old Italian based out of London. He was also one of many men who filmed scenes as creatures of the sea in the live-action film. Only, it turns out, he's acted a bit more in a very different industry."

The victim of this nonsense is Tomadini. As Inside the Magic goes on to say: "It's worth noting that the scenes within the film aren't of an adult nature. While the fact that Disney cast a 'really sexy' porn star in an extra role is quite surprising, it doesn't change the essence of the movie. Separating artists from art is essential to appreciating any film. JK Rowling and Harry Potter aren't tied at the hip, nor should 'The Little Mermaid' be linked to this blip. It doesn't deter fans from guessing, theorizing, and gossiping. All viewers can do is take casting with a grain of ocean salt and see the film for its modern take on a valuable classic."

Inside the Magic continues: "Going by the alias Dante Ferrari, the merman filmed various different pornographic films during his acting career, though not as a part of the Disney production. Reportedly, Disney cast a 'really sexy' porn star unaware of the finer print on their resume. What could have gone unnoticed came into focus when the actor tagged Disney in a post on Instagram. Spreading like a social media wildfire..."

With Tomadini being dragged into the culture wars as proof of Disney culpability with the LGBTQ+ agenda. In reporting the story for the far-right outlet [Breitbart](https://www.breitbart.com/entertainment/2023/06/15/nolte-report-says-disney-hired-gay-porn-star-for-little-mermaid-remake/), John Nolte opinionated:

"The report claims the hiring was 'accidental.' Still, it wouldn't surprise anyone who knows anything about Disney to discover this was some in-joke amongst the perverts and child exploiters who now run the Magic Kingdom. Are we supposed to believe a gazillion-dollar company doesn't run basic Google searches and background checks of potential employees? Well, maybe the company is too busy scheming to destroy the innocence of children to worry about such things.

"Disney has long been accused of adding secret sexual messages in its children's movies, a claim I found absurd until Disney came out of the closet as proud child groomers.

"What I'd like to know is how this report can claim Disney 'accidentally' hired a gay porn star when Disney has so far refused comment?"

In 2022 Ferrari posted a NSFW video on the adult male site English Lads with this description: "Dante Ferrari is one incredibly muscular Adonis and he's back this week showing off his beautifully tanned and ripped body! Dante has captivating blue eyes, amazing handsome features, and today he gives us a tour of my house in his clothes, then again naked, and lastly whilst he has a throbbing hard uncut erection!"

# Disney accidentally hired adult film star for The Little Mermaid

### Disney accidentally cast a porn star as one of the "really sexy" mermen in 'The Little Mermaid'.

12 June 2023

Disney accidentally cast a porn star in 'The Little Mermaid'.

![The Little Mermaid director Rob Marshall](https://www.femalefirst.co.uk/image-library/partners/bang/land/1000/r/rob-marshall-has-criticised-the-response-to-halle-baileys-ca.jpg)

The Little Mermaid director Rob Marshall

Casting bosses working on the live-action remake wanted to use "really sexy male models" to portray the mermen in the film, and among those hired for the job was 24-year-old Stefano Tomadini, who has also made adult movies under the alias Dante Ferrari.

His explicit films, for which he was paid up to £1,000 a time, are still available to watch online, though viewers have to pay.

A source told The Sun newspaper: “Casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie.

Dailymotion Video Player

![](https://s1.dmcdn.net/1/YeqiA1eNyhbRsLZli/1920x1080f)

Loading

Unmute

![](https://s1.dmcdn.net/w/4zZiN1eNzxUamAx_2)

Speed 2x

Click and hold to fast-forward

Video paused

“They had no idea about Stefano’s racy videos and, given 'The Little Mermaid' is the big summer blockbuster for kids, it’s a bit embarrassing for Disney.”

While filming the movie in Sardinia, Stefano shared a number of behind-the-scenes photos on Instagram.

Tagging Disney in the post, he wrote in the caption: “Lifetime memories with lifetime friends.(sic)"

A spokesperson for Disney declined to comment.

The Rob Marshall-helmed remake - which stars Halle Bailey in the title role - was previously dubbed “a classic” by big wigs at the movie studio and seen as an obvious choice for a reimagining.

Tony Chambers, the head of distribution at Disney told Variety: “It’s a classic. You ask a lot of women or men of my age and it’s ‘Little Mermaid’ and ‘Beauty and the Beast’ that rank as their favorite animated movie. It’s a story that takes them back to their respective childhoods and this movie is the perfect opportunity for a lot of people to pass that love on to the next generation.”

* * *

# Disney Cast a "Really Sexy" Porn Star in 'The Little Mermaid' Remake

[Skip to content](https://insidethemagic.net/2023/06/disney-cast-a-really-sexy-porn-star-in-the-little-mermaid-remake-cm1/#content)

[Home](https://insidethemagic.net/) » [Movies & TV](https://insidethemagic.net/movies-and-tv/) » [Movies](https://insidethemagic.net/movies-and-tv/movies/)

![Picture of Walt Disney logo and 'The Little Mermaid' as Disney casts a "really sexy" porn star by accident](https://insidethemagic.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Untitled-design-35-800x400.jpg)

![](https://insidethemagic.net/wp-content/themes/itm/includes/svgs/camera.svg)Credit: Disney

Though the studio is always one to hire actors that are easy on the eyes,  a shocking twist gave audiences a bit more than they bargained for as Disney cast a “really sexy” porn star in the remake of _The Little Mermaid._

The Little Mermaid \| Official Trailer - YouTube

[Photo image of Disney](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_5niPa-d35gg88HaS7RrIw?embeds_referring_euri=https%3A%2F%2Finsidethemagic.net%2F)

[Watch on YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kpGo2_d3oYE "Watch on YouTube")

The film itself grossed $117 million domestically at its debut, but it’s quickly gaining traction, reaching over $1 billion globally. This wasn’t without a [whole world of struggle](https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2023/jun/09/the-little-mermaid-global-backlash-black-ariel), with fans arguing about everything from skin and hair color to whether live-action remakes are even worthwhile. One argument that didn’t arise (until now), is the adult content created by one of the movie’s extras.

When casting the film, an inside source [went on record](https://www.thesun.co.uk/tv/22660887/disney-accidentally-cast-male-porn-star-little-mermaid/) saying, “Casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie.” Actor Stefano Tomadini is a 24-year-old Italian based out of London. He was also one of many men who filmed scenes as creatures of the sea in [the live-action film](https://insidethemagic.net/2023/06/little-mermaid-remake-beats-original-cj1/comments/). Only, it turns out, he’s acted a bit more in a very different industry.

Going by the alias Dante Ferrari, [the merman filmed](https://www.scarymommy.com/entertainment/mermen-picture-from-the-little-mermaid) various different pornographic films during his acting career, though not as a part of the Disney production. Reportedly, Disney cast a “really sexy” porn star unaware of the finer print on their resume. What could have gone unnoticed came into focus when the actor tagged Disney in a post on Instagram. Spreading like a social media wildfire, Twitter took the handle and [the rest is history](https://www.birminghammail.co.uk/news/showbiz-tv/disney-accidentally-cast-male-porn-27102191).

[![The Little Mermaid scene ](https://deadline.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/MCDLIME_WD048.jpg?w=681&h=383&crop=1)](https://deadline.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/MCDLIME_WD048.jpg?w=681&h=383&crop=1) Credit: Disney

It’s worth noting that the [scenes within the film aren’t of an adult nature](https://insidethemagic.net/2016/01/never-underestimate-the-power-of-parody-the-farce-awakens/). While the fact that Disney casts a “really sexy” porn star in an extra role is quite surprising, it doesn’t change the essence of the movie. Separating artists from art is essential to appreciating any film. JK Rowling and _[Harry Potter](https://insidethemagic.net/2021/03/hogwarts-houses-cb1mmb/ "Harry Potter")_ aren’t tied at the hip, nor should _The Little Mermaid_ be linked to this blip. It doesn’t deter fans from guessing, [theorizing](https://insidethemagic.net/2023/06/new-theory-connects-the-little-mermaid-frozen-and-tangled-in-a-tragic-way-jb1/), and gossiping. All viewers can do is take casting with a grain of ocean salt and see the film for its [modern take](https://insidethemagic.net/2023/06/little-mermaid-remake-beats-original-cj1/) on a valuable classic.

**What do you think about the fact that Disney cast a “really sexy” porn star in _The Little Mermaid_ remake? Big mistake or no big deal? Let Inside the Magic hear your thoughts in the comments below.**

## Disney Cast a Gay Male Porn Star in Live-Action ‘The Little Mermaid’

[Karina Smitt](https://bleedingfool.com/author/karinasmitt/) June 18, 2023

Stefano Tomadini, 24, who has also produced adult films under the moniker Dante Ferrari, was among those recruited for the role of the mermen in the live-action version because casting directors wanted to utilize “really sexy male models” for the role.

He received up to £1,000 per film for his explicit productions, which are still viewable online for a fee. He tagged Disney in the now [deleted](https://www.instagram.com/p/CaeyqTnA1EH/?utm_source=ig_embed&utm_campaign=loading) post and wrote: “Lifetime memories with lifetime friends.”

The Sun tabloid [quoted](https://torontosun.com/entertainment/movies/disney-accidentally-hired-adult-film-star-for-the-little-mermaid) an insider as saying: “Casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie,” which seems like an odd decision for a children’s flick. They claim they were unaware of Stefano’s explicit videos, which is embarrassing for Disney considering “The Little Mermaid” is their summer blockbuster aimed at children.

John Nolte at Breitbart had [the following](https://www.breitbart.com/entertainment/2023/06/15/nolte-report-says-disney-hired-gay-porn-star-for-little-mermaid-remake/) to say about the allegedly “accidental” hiring:

\[…\] it wouldn’t surprise anyone who knows anything about Disney to discover this was some in-joke amongst the perverts and child exploiters who now run the Magic Kingdom. Are we supposed to believe a gazillion-dollar company doesn’t run basic Google searches and background checks of potential employees? Well, maybe the company is too busy scheming to destroy the innocence of children to worry about such things.

Disney has [long](https://www.huffpost.com/entry/disney-sexual-messages_n_6452666) been [accused](https://www.straightdope.com/21342944/do-disney-movies-contain-subliminal-erotica) of adding secret sexual messages in its children’s movies, a claim I found absurd until Disney came out of the closet as proud child groomers.

What I’d like to know is how this report can claim Disney “accidentally” hired a gay porn star when Disney has so far refused comment?

The Rob Marshall-helmed remake – which stars Halle Bailey in the title role was seen as an obvious choice for a reimagining. Tony Chambers, the head of distribution at Disney calls the original “a classic. You ask a lot of women or men of my age and it’s ‘Little Mermaid’ and ‘Beauty and the Beast’ that rank as their favorite animated movie. It’s a story that takes them back to their respective childhoods and this movie is the perfect opportunity for a lot of people to pass that love on to the next generation.”

Yet a full three weeks after being released, _The Little Mermaid_ has only managed to collect $236 million domestic, and a mere $186 million globally. This will undoubtedly be another loss for Disney.

_Breitbart_ Senior Writer John Nolte reported on the move on June 15, citing a report by the _Toronto Sun_ three days prior. According to the _Sun_, casting directors for the remake of the 1989 animated movie [wanted to use "really sexy male models"](https://torontosun.com/entertainment/movies/disney-accidentally-hired-adult-film-star-for-the-little-mermaid) to portray the mermen in the film. Twenty-four-year-old Stefano Tomadini, who used the screen name Dante Ferrari in adult films, was among those hired.

"Casting bosses decided to hire a number of really sexy male models to play mermen in the movie," a source told the _Sun_. "They had no idea about Tomadini's racy videos. Given 'The Little Mermaid' is the big summer blockbuster for kids, it's a bit embarrassing for Disney."

According to the outlet, Tomadini's explicit films are still available to watch online, albeit with a fee. The adult film actor was reportedly paid up to £1,000 ($1,283.30) a time.

Tomadini shared a number of behind-the-scenes photos on his Instagram account while "The Little Mermaid" was being filmed at the island of Sardinia in Italy. He tagged Disney in one post, writing "lifetime memories with lifetime friends" in the caption. The said post was later deleted.

"The report claims the hiring was 'accidental.' Still, it wouldn't surprise anyone who knows anything about Disney to discover this was some in-joke among the perverts and child exploiters who now run the Magic Kingdom," wrote Nolte.

"Are we supposed to believe a gazillion-dollar company doesn't run basic Google Searches and background checks of potential employees? Well, maybe the company is too busy scheming to destroy the innocence of children to worry about such things." (Related: [Disney set to push more LGBTQ propaganda on children.](https://www.naturalnews.com/2022-08-18-disney-set-to-push-more-lgbtq-propaganda.html))

## Disney wants gayness to be "part of your world"

The entertainment giant "accidentally" hiring an adult film actor is no surprise, as the company explicitly stated its intent to [push more LGBT propaganda on children](http://leftcult.com/).

Back in June 2021, Disney hired drag performer Nina West – Andrew Robert Levitt in real life – [to participate in an LGBT Pride concert for children](https://www.breitbart.com/entertainment/2021/06/17/disney-hosting-lgbtq-pride-concert-aimed-at-children-starring-drag-queen-nina-west/). The Disney+ concert titled "This Is Me: Pride Celebration Spectacular" featured West and his fellow drag performer Jackie Cox. Both Cox and West appeared on the reality program "RuPaul's Drag Race."

Aside from the two drag performers, gender-fluid singer Alex Newell and gender non-binary performer Jesse James Keitel also graced the concert. The "This Is Me" concert reportedly featured performances of notable Disney tunes reinterpreted through an LGBT lens.

Almost two years after appearing in the "This Is Me" concert, West later [attended the May 8 world premiere](https://www.breitbart.com/entertainment/2023/05/09/disney-invites-drag-queen-nina-west-to-the-little-mermaid-world-premiere/) of "The Little Mermaid." The drag performer showed up at the premiere held at the Dolby Theater in Los Angeles wearing a neon green wig and bodysuit, violet lipstick and a dress.

West also cavorted with actress Melissa McCarthy, who played the antagonist in the movie. McCarthy herself admitted that her portrayal of Ursula the Sea Witch was inspired by drag queens.

Nevertheless, Nolte wondered how Disney can confirm that it indeed "accidentally" hired an adult film actor when it has so far refused comment. He also pointed out that the live-action remake of "The Little Mermaid" performed poorly overseas. While the movie grossed $236 million in the domestic market, it only earned a measly $186 million in the international market."

"Worldwide, it's hard to see Disney's latest remake hit $500 million – which means it will lose millions," the _Breitbart_ senior writer stated.

"Disney has long been accused of adding secret sexual messages in its children's movies, a claim I found absurd – until \[they\] came out of the closet [as proud child groomers](https://groomers.news/). Disney is now demonic, a slave to its fetishes, and I cheer every failure and setback."

# Disney accidentally cast porn star in The Little Mermaid

[Lydia Koh](https://theindependent.co/author/lydia/ "Lydia Koh")

By [Lydia Koh](https://theindependent.co/author/lydia/)

June 14, 2023

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Ftheindependent.co%2Fdisney-cast-porn-star%2F "Facebook") [Twitter](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Disney+accidentally+cast+porn+star+in+The+Little+Mermaid&url=https%3A%2F%2Ftheindependent.co%2Fdisney-cast-porn-star%2F&via=The+Independent+News "Twitter") [WhatsApp](https://api.whatsapp.com/send?text=Disney+accidentally+cast+porn+star+in+The+Little+Mermaid%20%0A%0A%20https://theindependent.co/disney-cast-porn-star/ "WhatsApp") [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=https://theindependent.co/disney-cast-porn-star/&title=Disney+accidentally+cast+porn+star+in+The+Little+Mermaid "Linkedin") [Telegram](https://telegram.me/share/url?url=https://theindependent.co/disney-cast-porn-star/&text=Disney+accidentally+cast+porn+star+in+The+Little+Mermaid "Telegram")

[More](https://theindependent.co/disney-cast-porn-star/# "More")

\- Advertisement -

Shares


![whatsapp sharing button](https://platform-cdn.sharethis.com/img/whatsapp.svg)Share

Reports have stated that Disney accidentally [cast](https://nz.news.yahoo.com/disney-accidentally-hired-adult-film-140038017.html) a porn star, Stefano Tomadini (also known as Dante Ferrari), in the live-action remake of “ _The Little Mermaid_.” Casting directors working on the film apparently intended to hire attractive male models to portray mermen in the movie. Stefano, a 24-year-old model, had previously appeared in adult films under the alias Dante Ferrari and his explicit videos can still be found online, albeit behind a paywall.

![Disney accidentally cast porn star in The Little Mermaid](https://media.theindependent.co/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/thelittlemermaid.jpg)Photo: Instagram/Disney Little Mermaid

## **Embarassing for Disney**

According to an unnamed source from The Sun newspaper, the casting team was unaware of Stefano’s adult film background. Since “ _The Little Mermaid_” is a highly anticipated film for kids, this situation is considered embarrassing for Disney.

During filming in Sardinia, Stefano shared behind-the-scenes photos on Instagram, including somewhere he tagged Disney and expressed his enjoyment of the experience. Disney declined to comment on the matter when approached by the media.

**A nostalgic movie**

\- Advertisement -

The live-action remake of “ _The Little Mermaid_,” directed by Rob Marshall and starring Halle Bailey in the lead role, has been regarded as a classic and an obvious choice for re-imagination. Tony Chambers, head of distribution at Disney, referred to it as a beloved animated movie for many people, evoking nostalgia and offering an opportunity to pass on that love to the next generation, as reported by [Variety](https://variety.com/2023/film/news/little-mermaid-memorial-day-box-office-fast-x-disney-1235627238/).

The highly anticipated Hollywood blockbuster, “ _The Little Mermaid_,” was [released](https://www.dailystar.co.uk/showbiz/us-showbiz/disney-hires-adult-video-actor-30213307) on May 26th, and fans worldwide have been rushing to theatres to see Disney’s latest adaptation. The film features Halle Bailey in the lead role of Ariel, instantly catapulting her to household name status among young fans.

# **Halle Bailey as Ariel**

Prior to her role in “ _The Little Mermaid_,” Halle had already gained recognition as a pop singer, forming a duo with her sister Chloe.

Following the release of promotional photos for the film, Disney’s makeup artists faced criticism for their portrayal of Ursula’s makeup.

# «La Petite Sirène»: un acteur porno engagé comme sirène par Disney

Capture d’écran Disney


Agence QMI

Jeudi, 15 juin 2023 08:46



Jeudi, 15 juin 2023 08:46



**Un acteur qui aurait joué dans des films pour adultes aurait accidentellement été engagé par Disney pour camper le rôle d’un homme sirène dans le remake du film pour enfants** **_La Petite Sirène_** **.**

«Les directeurs de _casting_ ont décidé d’engager de nombreux modèles masculins vraiment sexy pour jouer les sirènes dans le film. Ils n’avaient aucune idée des vidéos \[xxx\] de Stefano \[Tomadini\]», aurait confié une source interne à _The Sun_, selon ce qu’a rapporté le _National Post_ lundi.

Publicité

L’acteur de 24 ans aurait été engagé dans le _casting_ du film, en omettant vraisemblablement de décliner quelques parties de son CV. En effet, sous le pseudonyme Dante Ferrari, il aurait tenu un rôle dans plusieurs films pour adultes, qui lui auraient rapporté jusqu’à plus de 1600$ chacun, a poursuivi le _National Post_.

Ces derniers seraient par ailleurs toujours accessibles en ligne.

«Étant donné que _La Petite Sirène_ est le grand _blockbuster_ de l’été pour les enfants, c’est un peu gênant pour Disney», aurait poursuivi la source.

Durant le tournage de _La Petite Sirène_, sorti au cinéma depuis le 26 mai dernier, l’acteur aurait par ailleurs publié des photos des coulisses sur Instagram, selon le média anglophone.
